backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profile types, check-in structures, authorization mixins, and brutal friend feedback messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing the addition of the Usergeek tracking snippet and its associated metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/CLEAN_REBUILD.md: Guide explaining how to perform a clean rebuild of the frontend to resolve build or deployment issues.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point including metadata, favicon links, and the Usergeek analytics snippet.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Shell script that deletes build artifacts, caches, and lockfiles to force a clean frontend rebuild.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, actor initialization, status checks, and fallback UI flows.
frontend/src/components/BeerDonationDial: Modal dialog allowing users to copy a donation address with visual feedback and clipboard handling.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDial: Dialog that displays a random ‘brutal’ motivational message when opened.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendFeed: Card that fetches and displays the latest brutal friend feedback with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/ChanceOfDrinking: Card showing a random drinking‑risk level with color‑coded visual indicators.
Card computing days until Friday and the next full moon, generating corresponding normal and brutal messages.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckInDial: Dialog for daily check‑ins where users report sobriety, drink count, and mood, then submit the data.
frontend/src/components/DataLoggedDialog: Dialog confirming data submission with a message and optional variant styling.
frontend/src/components/DrinksChart.tsx: 14‑day bar chart visualizing drink counts, with update animations and loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpCheckInD: Dialog for quick follow‑up check‑ins where users confirm sobriety or enter additional drinks.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Global React error boundary displaying a styled fallback UI with reload and error details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header showing the app title and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/MoodIndicator.ts: Displays the user's latest mood metric with an icon and color‑coded label.
frontend/src/components/MotivationButton: Button that fetches a motivation message and shows it in a dialog with click limits.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Multi‑step onboarding questionnaire that collects user profile answers and submits them to the backend.
frontend/src/components/ProgressStats.ts: Shows key sobriety metrics such as sober days, streak, tracked days, and drunk days.
frontend/src/components/RepeatCheckInDia: Dialog for repeated daily check‑ins where users confirm sobriety or log drink counts.
frontend/src/components/SoberDaysSection: Displays current sober streak and progress toward a target number of sober days.
frontend/src/components/StatusIndicators: Displays weekly, yesterday, and today drinking-status indicators by computing normalized dates and average drinks from chart data.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedHeaderSec: Shows brutal-friend feedback and a motivation button with request handling, click limits, and dialog display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identity, handling login, clearing identity, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for onboarding and check-in status, user profile operations, and various backend interactions with retries.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind-based brutalist theme variables, fonts, glow utilities, and layout rules for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page managing daily check‑in flow, user data queries, and modal session state logic.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen with Internet Identity authentication and animated branding elements.
frontend/src/session/dailySessionFlow.ts: Deterministic state machine defining session phases, modal queues, and flow transitions for daily check‑ins.
frontend/src/utils/sobrietyDuration.ts: Parses onboarding sobriety duration text into a numeric day count with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing integration plans, features, and architectural notes.
